summary: Milo is a railroad brakeman, his wife a painter. They have some poet friends who spend a good bit of time hanging out at their apartment. When Milo and his wife are visited by their bishop,... See full summary Â»
cast: Jack Kerouac|Allen Ginsberg|Gregory Corso|Larry Rivers|Peter Orlovsky|David Amram|Richard Bellamy|Alice Neel|Sally Gross|Pablo Frank|Delphine Seyrig|Denise Parker
title: Pull My Daisy
